raw_text:
McClaren eyes Uefa Cup top spot
 
 Steve McClaren wants his Middlesbrough team to win their Uefa Cup group by beating Partizan Belgrade.
 
 Boro have already qualified for the knockout stages alongside Partizan and Villareal, at the expense of Lazio. But boss McClaren is looking for a victory which would mean they avoid a team that has played in the Champions League in Friday's third-round draw. "To need a win to finish top is fantastic, but it is going to be a tough one," McClaren said. "When the draw was made, I thought it was the toughest group of them all - and so it has proved. "Lazio were favourites, Villarreal have been semi-finalists, and Partizan have fantastic experience in Europe. "The pleasing thing is we did the business in the first two games. "Winning those two has put us in a great position and it has been a fantastic experience playing these teams."

llama3.2:3b: Steve McClaren wants Middlesbrough to beat Partizan Belgrade to win their Uefa Cup group, avoiding a tough Champions League draw against a team that has played in the competition before. Boro have already qualified for the knockout stages alongside them and Villarreal.

Middlesbrough have already secured two victories, placing them in a good position for further success.

smollm:1.7b:
Summarizing text concisely requires identifying the main ideas, key points, and supporting details. In this example, the main idea is that McClaren wants his Middlesbrough team to win their Uefa Cup group by beating Partizan Belgrade in Friday's third-round draw. The supporting detail is that Boro have already qualified for the knockout stages alongside Partizan and Villareal, at the expense of Lazio.

The summary should preserve key ideas and details, without including unnecessary information or explanations. In this case, the summary would be:

"McClaren wants his Middlesbrough team to win their Uefa Cup group by beating Partizan Belgrade in Friday's third-round draw."

McClaren aims to secure Middlesbrough's Uefa Cup top spot by defeating Partizan Belgrade, alongside Villareal, who are the other qualifiers. They will face Lazio in Friday's third-round draw. McClaren noted their strong start and excitement about winning against these teams.
tinyllama:1.1b:
McClaren: Midlothian will win Uefa Cup top spot by facing PartiZan
Steve McClaren wants to claim the coveted Uefa Cup group-winner's spot by beating PartiZan Belgrade in the third round. Boro are already through to the knockout stages, but coach McClaren is focused on ensuring they avoid a team that has played in the Champions League, such as Lazio and Villarreal. "Winning this group, with the three teams we've beaten so far - Lazio, Villareale and PartiZan - I thought it was going to be a tough group," McClaren said. "When the draw was made, I thought it would be the most difficult group of them all, but it has proven to be the most challenging." While Boro are favourites for the group, Villarreal and Lazio have a wealth of experience in Europe, while PartiZan have a thrilling final-game victory over Villarreal. Despite being in the top spot, McClaren is confident of progressing to the knockout stages. "It's great to be in the top position but it is going to be a tough group," he said.
tinydolphin:1.1b: Steve McClaren's team, Middlesbrough, aim to win their Uefa Cup group by defeating Partizan Belgrade. The winning goal will be a crucial part of their journey to the quarterfinals where they face off against Lazio and Villarreal in the third-round draw. However, it won't be an easy task for the Teessiders who have been through tougher groups before. They are aiming for a spot at the top of Group 6.
